<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Helper RAII class to post-process inserted asan runtime calls during a pass on a single <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a>.

Upon end of scope, detects and applies the required funclet OpBundle.

Definition at line 653 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instrumentation/addresssanitizer-cpp">AddressSanitizer.cpp</a>.
